intro: Pilosella dissoluta, commonly known as the slender pearly everlasting, is a flowering plant native to Europe and parts of Asia. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its delicate, white to pale yellow flowers that bloom in summer. The plant has finely hairy stems and leaves, which give it a soft,绒-like appearance. It typically grows in open, sunny habitats such as meadows and rocky areas. Pilosella dissoluta is often found in disturbed soils and can thrive in a variety of soil types.
